item.title: Cerebrations
item.description: As someone who is wrapped up in the fast paced tech dominated world we now live in, how can one endevour to live a more mindful and grounded existance whilst thriving amongst the rest of society? this is what I aim to explore. The stream of conciousness nature of this blog is heavily inspired by the writings of Roman emporor and Stoic philosipher Marcus Aurelius.
